name: Brian Lusina
bio:
Brian Lusina is an end to end product developer who takes a wide view of the whole system and focuses on building products that benefit both the organization and the customer.

Brian inherently understands that the customer is the single most valuable asset of an organization and is thus driven to create the best user-experience. He is currently a Senior Software Developer at I&M Bank building digital products. LJournal is where he writes about ideas longer than 280 characters.
When not coding, he is traveling, planning for the next adventure and trying very hard not to be the worst player on the football pitch.
